<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Rebuke Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=446)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 396 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" /></row>
<row>([somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 20-foot emanation

**Target** 1 living creature per action spent to cast this spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You snatch creatures from the jaws of death. You can spend 1 to 3 actions Casting this Spell, and you can target a number of creatures equal to the actions spent. Each target regains 3d6 Hit Points. If the target had the dying condition, coming back from dying due to this healing doesn't increase its wounded condition.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the healing by 1d6.
name: Rebuke Death
